fields.name: macaddress
fields.doc: The true macaddress of the device. This may not always be the broadcasted mac address of the device

fields.name: name
fields.doc: The broadcasted name of the device

fields.name: rssi
fields.doc: The current signal strength of the device

fields.name: type
fields.doc: The unique identifier assigned by Withings for the device type

fields.name: battery
fields.doc: The current battery level of the device

fields.name: firmware
fields.doc: The version of the firmware currently on the device

fields.name: model
fields.doc: The unique identifier assigned to the device's model

fields.name: manufacturer
fields.doc: The unique identifier assigned to the mannufacturer who made the device
